thread.title: Trump Accuser Jessica Drake Was a One-Woman Protest at the Porn Oscars
thread.title_full: Trump Accuser Jessica Drake Was a One-Woman Protest at the Porn Oscars

author: Katie Van Syckle
title: Trump Accuser Jessica Drake Was a One-Woman Protest at the Porn Oscars
text:
Despite the ubiquity of celebrities with political opinions, and celebrities on red carpets — civil disobedience on a step-and-repeat is still pretty rare.

But leave it to a porn star to buck the trend. On Saturday night, at the 2017 AVN Awards, a.k.a. the “porn Oscars,” held just off the... More »
